title: The next frontier: Indian chemical industry readies for giant leapfrog - Indian Chemical News
summary: The article discusses the growth and opportunities in the Indian chemical industry, driven by rising demands, supply chain diversification, and government initiatives like production linked incentives and investments in the sector.
product_or_process: green product and green process innovations in the Indian chemical industry
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 325, 541, 562, 551 - Chemical manufacturing, Professional, Scientific, and Technical Services, Waste Management and Remediation Services, and Management of Companies and Enterprises
